pullRequest.title: [Microservices] Route manager
pullRequest.bodyText: In this PR, we create a new microservice called Route Manager to manage the lifecycle of network routing table and rules. The Route Manager could store routing tables/rules for vpc, subnet, and gateway. It will interact with vpc manager, subnet manager, and gateway manager.

commit.message:
Merge pull request #1 from futurewei-cloud/master

Replace Redis with Apache Ignite for in memory cache and db (#129)
Rename directory name from Common-service to lib
Update common jar and use latest package path in vpcmanager
update vpc manager jar package name
Reformat some files in vpc manager
route manager codes and update vpc manager
Add get/create apis on route manager and post call from vpc to route
Update gitignore to exclude logs file
Remove lib jar and add dependency on pom
Remove lib jar and add dependency on pom for route manager
update alcor route manager service and package name
Merge branch 'feature/route_manager' of https://github.com/kevin-zhonghao/alcor into feature/route_manager
Move routemanager under services and rename it to route_manager
Add web route schema and update vpc schema
Delete unused yaml files for vpcmanager

nodes.bodyText: As discussed in teams, we want to use the docker image tag to track the image version, maybe that would come later?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -15,7 +15,8 @@ spec:
         app: apimanager
     spec:
       containers:
-        - image: zhonghaolyu/repo:apiKube4
+        #- image: zhonghaolyu/repo:apiKube4
+        - image: fwnetworking/controller:apiKube1

@@ -0,0 +1,37 @@
+apiVersion: apps/v1
+kind: Deployment
+metadata:
+  labels:
+    app: routemanager
+  name: routemanager
+spec:
+  selector:
+    matchLabels:
+      app: routemanager
+  replicas: 1
+  template:
+    metadata:
+      labels:
+        app: routemanager
+    spec:
+      containers:
+        #- image: zhonghaolyu/repo:routeKube

@@ -15,7 +15,8 @@ spec:
         app: vpcmanager
     spec:
       containers:
-        - image: zhonghaolyu/repo:test1
+        #- image: zhonghaolyu/repo:vpcKube2
+        - image: fwnetworking/controller:vpcKube1

nodes.bodyText: Looks like there is an extra empty line :)?
we will need the copy right header for each source file.
I am curious, what is the benefit of catching the ParameterNullOrEmptyException and just rethrow it after?
this /* ... */ comment style is different from other places. Maybe we want to keep it consistent by using '//' only?
